description:
goprotobuf: Fix Marshal crash on typed nil.

Also a bunch of other trivial updates.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf

http://codereview.appspot.com/6501064/diff/4001/proto/text.go
File proto/text.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6501064/diff/4001/proto/text.go#newcode95
proto/text.go:95: log.Printf("proto: textWriter unindented too far")
On 2012/08/30 04:19:47, r wrote:
> you want this return

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6501064/diff/4001/proto/clone.go
File proto/clone.go (right):

why is this reordered?

File proto/text.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6501064/diff/4001/proto/text.go#newcode95
proto/text.go:95: log.Printf("proto: textWriter unindented too far")
you want this return

http://codereview.appspot.com/6501064/diff/4001/protoc-gen-go/generator/generator.go

http://codereview.appspot.com/6501064/diff/4001/protoc-gen-go/generator/generator.go#newcode55

again
